why: ACT helps you live by values while reducing pain‑related distress.

slides.title: Acceptance & Values
slides.content: ACT teaches accepting pain while taking action toward what matters most in your life

slides.title: Psychological Flexibility
slides.content: Learn to observe thoughts and feelings without being controlled by them

slides.title: Living with Purpose
slides.content: Focus on meaningful activities and values rather than waiting for pain to disappear

slides.title: Values-Based Action
slides.content: ACT helps you take meaningful action aligned with your values, even when pain is present.

slides.title: Myth vs Fact
slides.content: Myth: Acceptance means giving up. Fact: It frees energy to pursue what matters.

slides.title: Try this today
slides.content: Notice‑Name‑Nurture: label a tough thought, breathe, and take one valued action.
